ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for disorders that identify a patient who has an anaphylactic allergic reaction.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have an anaphylactic reaction to a substance. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to an attribute of reaction.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only include codes that represent the disorder of anaphylaxis using SNOMED CT.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
